mapper.sql: comment_id AS commentId, product_id AS productId, user_id AS userId, user_name AS userName, pic_img AS picImg, order_id AS orderId, star, content, good_count AS goodCount, bad_count AS badCount, status, type, create_time AS createTime, create_by AS createBy, update_time AS updateTime, update_by AS updateBy
mapper.select: SELECT comment_id, user_id, user_name, pic_img, star, content, good_count, create_time FROM os_comment WHERE status = #{status} AND product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY ${pageInfo.sort} ${pageInfo.order}

SELECT c.comment_id, c.user_id, c.user_name, c.pic_img, c.star, c.content, c.good_count, c.create_time, r.comment_reply_id, r.user_id AS reply_user_id, r.user_name AS reply_user_name, r.pic_img AS reply_pic_img, r.content AS reply_content, r.good_count AS reply_good_count, r.type FROM os_comment c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT comment_reply_id, comment_id, user_id, user_name, pic_img, content, good_count, status, type FROM os_comment_reply WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY type DESC, comment_reply_id DESC ) r ON c.comment_id = r.comment_id WHERE c.
